search_results.full_title: Lucky for You by Novo Amor & Gia Margaret
search_results.title: Lucky for You
search_results.lyrics:
Lucky for You Lyrics[Intro : Guitar]

[Verse 1]
What can I say
I’m nothing to myself
And tired of starting up my day
But in the morning I could meet you

[Chorus]
I’m not what I thought
I would be without you
I’m not really sure why
I slept in my shoes
I’m nothing at all
I’m nothing at all
[Pre-Chorus]
Lucky for you
I’m nothing without
The thought of starting all my days
With the mornings when I see you
I’m bored of staring at my face
Every morning when I need you
Every morning when I need you

[Outro]
I’m not what I thought
I would be without you
I’m not really sure why I do what I do
I’m nothing at all
I’m nothing at allYou might also likeEmbed

description.plain: The title “Lucky for You” is alluding to how her significant other is lucky that she is so infatuated with them.

annotatable.title: Lucky for You

body.plain: The title “Lucky for You” is alluding to how her significant other is lucky that she is so infatuated with them.

annotations:
I’m not what I thought
 I would be without you
She is surprised at how different her emotions are when she’s with vs without her significant other.

What can I say
 I’m nothing to myself
 And tired of starting up my day
 But in the morning I could meet you
This song talks about infatuation. Not having self worth (“I’m nothing to myself”), and feeling shitty whenever you’re without your significant other.

search_results.full_title: No Fun by Novo Amor & Gia Margaret
search_results.title: No Fun
search_results.lyrics:
No Fun Lyrics[Verse 1]
I don't know what happened
To the old town
Like the shadow of my mother
In the background

[Chorus]
It's not enough to know
It's not enough anymore

[Verse 2]
Every step that I took
Was a bad one
With the shadow of my father
Having no fun
[Chorus]
It's not enough to know
It's not enough anymore
It's not enough to know
What that caused

[Verse 3]
I don't know how I'll change
What I can't say
With the shadow my brother
I was a mistake

[Chorus]
It's not enough to know
It's not enough anymore
It's not enough to know
What that caused
What that caused
What that causedYou might also like2Embed

[Outro: Speaker 1 & Speaker 2]

And do it on a song
Okay
Your favourite song, and [?]

Yeah

search_results.title: ​lesson
search_results.lyrics:
​lesson LyricsIs it all in my head
Dear one, dear one?
I'll find a reason instead
And I'm avoiding your love
When I told you a lie to get you off
The phone
I thought it was to save you
And when I'm alone
I think it is to save you

Did I miss a lesson
When I
Was younger
When I should've learned
How to be a person and how
To believe in what I deserve?You might also like1Embed

search_results.title: ​body
search_results.lyrics:
​body Lyrics[Narration: Alan Watts]
How does your head look to your eyes?
Well, I'll tell you
It looks like what you see out in front of you
Because all that you see out in front of you is how you feel inside your head

It is easy enough to stand still
The difficulty is to walk without touching the ground
Why do you feel so heavy?
It isn't just a matter of gravitation and weight
It is that you feel that you are carrying your body around
Common speech expresses this all the time; "life is a drag"!
"I feel I am just dragging myself around."
"My body is a burden to me."
To whom? To whom, that's the question. You see?
And when there is nobody left for whom the body can be a burden, the body isn't a burden
But so long as you fight it, it is

It's like saying...you know, "to feel the feelings"
It is a redundant expressionYou might also likeEmbed

description.plain: “Body” samples a lecture titled “Overcome Social Anxiety” by the British philosopher Alan Watts, a “continuous source of comfort & perspective for Gia in times of confusion.”

search_results.title: Smoke (Acoustic)
search_results.lyrics:
Smoke (Acoustic) Lyrics[Verse 1]
Misty moon spills through old windows
Of our earthly room with you on the right side
Spill into you on the right side
Of our bed
Of our bed
Of our bed

[Verse 2]
I’ll never tell you I cried in the bathroom
The first night we moved in
And you went out to smoke
Reminded now when you just spoke
In our bed
In our bed
In our bedYou might also likeEmbed

search_results.title: ​barely there
search_results.lyrics:
​barely there LyricsDo you ever feel
Do you ever feel like you're living your life
But you're also barely there?
(You're also barely there?)

Conversations you can't remember, because...when you had them, your mind was just trying to make it to the next sentence
Just trying to make it to the next sentence without anyone noticing
The vacancy in your eyes, or your body and face trying to pull off "fine"
And it may be believable to those who don't care, because...it's more fun that way
And I guess you're more enjoyable when you laugh a lot
(You're there.​)You might also like1Embed
